name: OwnerPublishDuplicate
comment: The owner of an app or a stream should be able to publish, and the owner of an app should be able to duplicate

name: Stream
rule: (resource.resourcetype = "App" and resource.stream.HasPrivilege("read")) or ((resource.resourcetype = "App.Object" and resource.published ="true" and resource.objectType != "app_appscript" and resource.objectType != "loadmodel") and resource.app.stream.HasPrivilege("read")) and 1=1
comment: The user should see the resource if he/she has read access to the stream it is published to
